name: Safe-Cado-Shoppo
description:
Learn the difficulties of shopping while social distancing.

Stay 2m (6ft) away from the other 9 shoppers and find your items.

Don't believe the close calls to be accurate? Turn on the bubble colliders 'B' and see for yourself (Doing so is logged).

Tip if you enjoy it. This is a between semester student side project.

PS: 'Q' will reset your saved score on the next 'R'.
